faqs.question: How do I rent a car?
faqs.answer: To rent a car, browse our selection online, choose your preferred vehicle, and complete the booking process. You can also visit one of our locations to rent a car in person.

faqs.question: What is the minimum age to rent a car?
faqs.answer: The minimum age to rent a car with our company is 21 years old. However, drivers under the age of 25 may be subject to additional fees and restrictions.

faqs.question: Do you offer any discounts?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer discounts for AAA members, military personnel, and other eligible groups. Check our website or contact us for more information on available discounts.

faqs.question: What documents do I need to rent a car?
faqs.answer: To rent a car, you will need a valid driver's license, proof of insurance, and a valid credit card in your name. Additional documentation may be required for international renters.

faqs.question: Can I extend my rental period?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can extend your rental period by contacting our customer service team or visiting one of our locations. Additional charges may apply for extending your rental.
